title: Katy Perry and Blue Origin crew return safely to Earth after space flight – video
description: Six women, including the pop star Katy Perry and the morning TV host Gayle King, have safely completed a trip into space. They used a rocket owned by Jeff Bezos, the Amazon co-founder and commercial space flight entrepreneur. His fiancee, Lauren Sánchez, was also on the flightBlue Origin crew including Katy Perry safely returns to Earth after space flight Continue reading...
excerpt: They used a rocket owned by Jeff Bezos, the Amazon co-founder and commercial space flight entrepreneur

His fiancee, Lauren Sánchez, was also on the flight Blue Origin crew including Katy Perry safely returns to Earth after space flight
html:
Six women, including the pop star Katy Perry and the morning TV host Gayle King, have safely completed a trip into space. They used a rocket owned by Jeff Bezos, the Amazon co-founder and commercial space flight entrepreneur. His fiancee, Lauren Sánchez, was also on the flight

  • Blue Origin crew including Katy Perry safely returns to Earth after space flight
